Around the Web

Copyright © soundwanders 2021
Theme created by Start Bootstrap

Countdown

A countdown clock, ticking down to the start of the NHL playoffs. Landing-page style, static design. Features a flash-game style CSS animation of hockey pucks shooting towards a goal.

  • Visit: Countdown
  • Tools: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
  • Date: May 2021
  • Category: Web Development

Nebula

Image gallery of discovered nebulae built with Bootstrap. Modal images pop out when clicked on for a full-screen view on mobile and on desktop it is shown in its full scale. Features a background animation of shooting stars created with CSS.

  • Visit: Nebula
  • Tools: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2021
  • Category: Web Development

Node Scraper

Web scraping data from multiple websites using Node. One scraper gathers a list of all the schools who won the Minnesota High School State Hockey Tournament. Another scraper creates a list of Endangered Species and their current conservation status.

  • Visit: Node Scraper
  • Tools: Node.js, Axios, Cheerio, Puppeteer
  • Date: March 2021
  • Category: Web Development

Timbuktu

Timbuktu is a digital library for books and podcasts about ancient civilizations. There is a static demo hosted on Github Pages and a full-stack web application hosted on Google Firebase that authorizes user login with Github and Google's OAuth. Data stored permanently under either the authorized user's ID or an automatically generated ID. in Firebase's database.

  • Visit: Timbuktu
  • Tools: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SkeletonCSS
  • Date: February 2021
  • Category: Web Development

Makehero

MakeHero is a mock character creation application that allows the user to select one of 3 heroes (Gladiator, Ninja, Samurai) and set their attributes. I created the characters and designed the background of the page to gain a better understanding of proper dimensions when designing for the web. Also experimented with different image resolutions/sizes to explore the balancing of image quality and rendering speed. Far from perfect but a highly enjoyable learning experience.

  • Visit: Makehero
  • Tools: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
  • Date: December 2020
  • Category: Web Development

Budget

A simple budget calculator web application. The user is able to input their monthly income, create a list of expenses and calculate their remaining budget. Regular expressions are used to check user inputs for accepted values.

  • Visit: Budget
  • Tools: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
  • Date: October 2020
  • Category: Web Development
